import React, {useEffect} from "react"; import { handleScroll } from "../utils/navUtils"; import {FontAwesomeIcon} from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import {faSun} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import '../Styles/NavBar.css' export default function NavBar() { function scrollToElement(event){ handleScroll(event) } useEffect(() => { const home = document.querySelector('#welcome-section'); home.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth'}) }, []) return (
  • Home
  • About
  • Work
  • Contact
) }
